name: Synclavier Program File
summary: Learn about .SPRG files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: You most likely will only encounter an SPRG file if you use SynclavierX software. However, SynclavierX has been discontinued, making SPRG files uncommon.
NOTE: SynclavierX is a program that emulates the capabilities of a Synclavier digital synthesizer, which was a physical music workstation manufactured from the 1970s to the 1990s.

description: An SPRG file contains a compiled and executable program created by SynclavierX, a digital synthesizer application for Mac. It can be opened in SynclavierX to play a musical composition.
